document.full_text: as the former head of mtv networks international, bill roedy drew on his military career to build a youth entertainment business across 165 countries with an audience of millions -- and he had fun along the way.
document.title: bill roedy reflects on military and mtv in new book
lines_and_colors: as the former head of mtv networks international, bill roedy drew on his military career to build a youth entertainment business across 165 countries with an audience of millions -- and he had fun along the way.
